Alasan Pinjol Ilegal Simpan Server di Luar Negeri
02 Nov 2019, 12:20 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi pinjaman online. (CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Satuan Tugas Waspada Investasi baru saja menemukan 34 persen dari 1.773 pinjaman online ilegal berasal dari server yang berlokasi di luar Indonesia.Pengamat keamanan siber dari Vaksincom Alfons Tanujaya mengatakan, dari sisi basis data, tidak ada ancaman risiko serangan siber tambahan ketika server berada di luar negeri. Intinya, baik server yang berada di luar negeri maupun di Indonesia memiliki risiko serangan siber yang sama."Dari sisi basis data sebenarnya tidak terlalu jadi masalah, karena meskipun di Indonesia pun data dengan mudah dikirimkan ke luar negeri," kata Alfons saat dihubungi CNNIndonesia.com, Jumat (1/11).Bagi Alfons, persoalannya ialah ada pelanggaran dari sisi operasional. Operator atau pengendali server tersebut berasal dari luar negeri untuk menghindari endusan pihak berwajib."Alasan dioperasikan dari luar negeri karena mereka takut berurusan dengan pihak berwajib. Jadi yang di Indonesia hanya kaki tangan, otaknya di luar negeri," kata Alfons.Alfons mengatakan otak di balik entitas pinjaman online tersebut berada di luar negeri, karena belajar dari kesalahan sebelumnya. Belum lagi ketatnya hukum bagi Warga Negara Asing (WNA) apabila melanggar hukum di Indonesia."Ini mereka belajar dari pengalaman sebelumnya di mana operator di tangkap pihak berwenang. Jadi mereka sekarang cari aman otaknya di luar negeri dan kaki tangannya saja di sini," katanya.Alfons mengatakan sesungguhnya mudah untuk memberantas pinjaman online ilegal. Meskipun dioperasikan dari luar negeri, sumber dana peminjaman berada di Indonesia. Alfons mengatakan pihak berwajib bisa melacak sumber dana tersebut kemudian memblokirnya."Uangnya itu kan di sini. Jadi lacak saja rekeningnya dan bekukan. Kalau pihak berwenang konsisten dan serius melakukan ini saya pikir tidak sulit. Kalau sumber dananya di blokir lama-lama mereka kapok," kata AlfonsKetua Satgas Waspada Investasi Tongam Lumban Tobing mengaku menemukan 1.773 pinjaman online ilegal yang tak terdaftar dan tidak berizin dari Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) selama periode 2018-2019.Sebelumnya, sebanyak 34 persen dari 1.773 entitas pinjaman online itu atau sekitar 602 entitas memiliki server berlokasi di luar Indonesia. Sementara, 22 persen server berasal dari Indonesia, sedangkan 44 persen lainnya belum diketahui keberadaannya hingga kini.Persoalannya, meskipun pinjaman online itu telah diblokir oleh pemerintah, pemilik dan pengendalinya tetap dapat menciptakan entitas baru pinjaman online ilegal dengan server yang berlokasi di luar negeri. (jnp/lav)

Reasons for Illegal Loans to Save Servers Overseas
02 Nov 2019, 12:20 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Online loan illustration. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Investment Alert Task Force recently found 34 percent of 1,773 illegal online loans come from servers located outside Indonesia. Cyber security observer from Vaksincom Alfons Tanujaya said, from the database side, there was no threat of additional cyber attacks when the server is abroad. In essence, both servers that are abroad and in Indonesia have the same risk of cyber attacks. "From the database side, it really doesn't really matter, because even though in Indonesia the data is easily sent abroad," Alfons said when contacted by CNNIndonesia. com, Friday (1/11). For Alfons, the problem is there are operational violations. The server operators or controllers come from abroad to avoid the authorities' sapping. "The reason is operated from abroad because they are afraid of dealing with the authorities. So in Indonesia, only accomplices, their brains abroad," Alfons said. Alfons said the brain in behind the online loan entity is abroad, because it learns from previous mistakes. Not to mention the strictness of the law for Foreign Citizens (foreigners) when breaking the law in Indonesia. "This they learn from previous experience where the operator was arrested by the authorities. So they are now looking for safe brains abroad and only accomplices here," he said Alfons said it was actually easy to eradicate illegal online loans. Although it is operated from abroad, the source of loan funds is in Indonesia. Alfons said the authorities could track down the source of the funds and then block them. "The money is here. So just trace the account and freeze it. If the authorities are consistent and serious about doing this, I think it is not difficult. "said Alfons, the Chairperson of the Investment Alert Task Force, Lumban Tobing, said that he found 1,773 unregistered and unlicensed online loans from the Financial Services Authority (OJK) during the 2018-2019 period. Previously, 34 percent of the 1,773 online loan entities or around 602 entities had The server is located outside Indonesia. Meanwhile, 22 percent of servers are from Indonesia, while the other 44 percent are unknown until now. The problem is, even though the online loans have been blocked by the government, the owners and controllers can still create new illegal online loan entities with servers located overseas.
